nodes.text: This Jawa tribe was led by Iziz during the Jedi Civil War. Several members of the tribe were enslaved by the Sand People, and Iziz asked Czerka Corporation for help but they refused. Iziz later asked the amnesiac Revan for help, who accepted on the terms that the Jawa would lead him to the Star Map. Revan spoke to the Sand People chieftain with the assistance of HK-47 and negotiated their release.
